featured.text: If student enrollment continues to drop, some programs at the university may be to reduce the operation costs.
While some say free online courses are a great way to increase the enrollment of minority students, others have said they will leave many students behind.

definition.zh_def: 註冊，登記，特別是指在學校或課程中的報名過程。
definition.en_def: The act of registering or enrolling, especially in a school or course.
definition.example: Her enrollment in the university was completed last week.
